description:
After docking at the space station, Dot sees a group of space pirates!  
One of those shady smugglers leaves behind a strange tool. It seems to be broken.  
Do you think you can fix it?

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn the lights off then automatically turn off all eye lights.
After turning off the eye lights, make Dot turn on green lights when the top button is pressed.
puzzles.introduction: I think we can turn this thing on by adding a little "force" to the top button.

hints.description: Link the states with a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on green lights, make Dot automatically play the Light Sword state.
puzzles.introduction:
Hmmm.  
It's glowing, but still not fully working.  Let's add another fix.

hints.description: Link the states with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the Light Sword state, make Dot wait for 2.0 s then do nothing.

hints.description: Link the states with a Wait For cue set to 2.0 s.

puzzles.description: After doing nothing, make Dot play a new Light Sword state when Dot feels a slide left, slide right, slide forward, or slide backward.
puzzles.introduction: Let's wave this thing around and see how it works!

hints.description: Link the Do Nothing state to the Light Sword state using Slide Left, Slide Right, Slide Forward, and Slide Backward cues.

puzzles.description: After the new Do Nothing state, make Dot wait for 1.0 s then return to the first Do Nothing state.

hints.description: Link the two Do Nothing states with a Wait For cue set to 1.0 s.

puzzles.description: After the second Do Nothing state, make Dot play a new Light Sword state when Dot feels a shake.
puzzles.introduction: This "light sword" is a cut above the rest.  Let's practice our battle moves!

hints.description: Link the states with a Shake cue.
